name: CET: Available
description: Control enforcement technology prevents exploits from hijacking the control-flow transfer instructions for both forward-edge (indirect call/jmp) and back-edge transfer (ret).
failure-impact: A local or physical attacker with an existing unrelated vulnerability can use a reliable and well-known method to run arbitrary code.

success-results.enabled: CET feature enabled by the platform
success-results.supported: CET feature support by the platform

resolution: Check your CPU supports CET, and ensure the feature is enabled in the UEFI setup screen.
